description:

name: SIFONN PRO
description: Sifonn is a display typeface consisting in 3 weights, a Pro version with more than 900 glyphs, with a large set of ligatures, titling alternates, fractions, catch words and multiple opentype features. It also comes with a Basic and Basic Outline version with the standard char set (360 glyphs), both available for free download. You can download the Basic and Outline version for free HERE Designer: Rafa Goicoechea Format: Open type, Mac/Windows

name: Cairo Slab UT
description:
Redesign of a quircky Slab Serif variations from the book "100 alphabets publicitaires" (1946). The font includes accents and some extra ligatures. 

<u>Designer:</u> Hector Carrillo & W∑T∑

<u>Format:</u> Open type, Mac/Windows

    file:"cairo",
    families:"cairo_slabregular",
    size_min:60,
    size_max:160,
    families_weights:"",
    initial_size:100,
    line_height:"1",
    max_characters:40,

};
</script>

description:

a decorative stripe to each character.Both fonts have a contemporary finish making them suitable for any design purpose or application.

<u>Designer:</u> Max Little

description:
Avanth Typeface was born from the search of a display typeface to use in titles with a real personality, but trying to keep it legible in big sizes. Its personality is based on the small details of each letter (unique in each one of them) using just geometric simple shapes.
It features Uppercase A-Z letters with three different variations (Light, Blank & Regular).

<u>Designer:</u> Noem9 Studio

<u>Format:</u> Open type, Mac/Windows

Ballege Typeface is a Slab Serif inspired by College sports and ball games.
I started working on it after watching the film 'MoneyBall', Directed by Bennet Miller. It's inspired by College sports and ball games.
This typeface features more than 200 glyphs, including different punctuation, currency or lots of symbols.

name: Struktur
description:
Struktur is a geometric display type inspired by Herbert Bayer's experiment Proposal For A Universal Type (1925-30). The proposal was made in a time before the prevailing principles of type design where made, especially visual correction for readability. This font wanted to stay true to Bayer's original ideals and so kept the type completely fixed width, forsaking readability for symmetry. 

The entire character set is based on a strict two circle grid and all terminals are restricted to 90˚ or 45˚. It is a bold typeface that has a fixed flow and heavy contrast.

<u>Designer:</u> Shiva Nallaperumal

<u>Format:</u> Open type, Mac/Windows
<script>
var widget_type = widget_type || {
    file:"struktur",
    families:"strukturbold",
    size_min:60,
    size_max:150,
    families_weights:"",
    initial_size:90,
    line_height:"1.2",
    max_characters:40,
    default_text: 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog',
};
</script>

};

name: Decode
description:
Decode is a retro styled font, referencing the art deco typography from the 1920s and 30s. The font is designed to be in keeping with the art deco style but with a contemporary and modern finish making it a stylish font for all kinds of work.

The typeface is available in 3 complimentary styles. Use one on its own as a headline font or combine all three to create eye catching typographic displays. Each version comes with deco styled caps with an alternate uppercase to add extra variation to your work.

<u>Designer:</u> Max Little

<u>Format:</u> Open type, Mac/Windows
<script>
var widget_type = widget_type || {
    file:"decode",
    families:"decode_1regular|decode_2light|decode_3regular",
    size_min:60,
    size_max:140,
    families_weights:"DARK|LIGHT|SHADE",
    initial_size:90,
    line_height:"NORMAL",
    max_characters:40,
    default_text: 'THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER THE LAZY DOG',
};
</script>

description:
Loopo was created as an experiment with rotating forms. The cut of the stencil shows the rotation and creates a reference to motion throughout the font. Characters are created by manipulating the rotations of the stencil which gives the font a round and fluid look.

name: Ligan
description:
Ligan is a serif font. The idea was to produce a font that express a mixture of safety, cleanliness, and sharpness. Letters g, e, a, s is to give the writing a strong character. I started to build on the letter g.

<u>Designer:</u> Jan-Christian Bruun

name: Mass
description:
MASS is a super heavy stencil font. Designed to be used at large sizes for maximum impact. A perfect headline or poster font, or even better as a huge font for supergraphics, the modular construction of the characters creates letterforms that are legible as type but also very effective as a tool for patterns. Although super heavy and solid, MASS is also energetic and dynamic. 

<u>Designer:</u> Max Little

<u>Format:</u> Open type, Mac/Windows
<script>
var widget_type = widget_type || {
    file:"mass",
    families:"massregular",
    size_min:60,
    size_max:140,
    families_weights:"",
    initial_size:90,
    line_height:"0.92",
    max_characters:40,
    default_text: 'THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER THE LAZY DOG',
};
</script>

name: Parc FF
description:
Parc FF is a grotesk font, with three types bold, regular 
and light. The idea was to create a font with the cleanliness and smooth 
lines in each letter. The font was used as a display typography 
in an upcoming documentary film.

<u>Designer:</u> Jan-Christian Bruun

<u>Format:</u> Open type, Mac/Windows
<script>
var widget_type = widget_type || {
    file:"parcff",
    families:"parc_ff_lightlight|parc_ff_regularregular|parc_ffbold",
    size_min:20,
    size_max:120,
    families_weights:"LIGHT|REGULAR|BOLD",
    initial_size:60,
    line_height:"0.85",
    max_characters:40,
    default_text: 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog',
};
</script>

options.name: Pro (Light, Regular Bold, commercial use, Otf Woff)

name: Favela
description: Favela font is a display free typeface based on Brazilian graffiti (Pixaçoes). Despite being inspired on graffiti forms, its geometric construction gives it a more modern look and try to point it away from the common clichés of graffiti. Download it here Designer: W∑T∑ Format: Open type, Mac/Windows

name: Deibi
description: Deibi is a display free font inspired by the shape of a child's writing. One of its main features is the same height for Caps and Small Caps, which give to the font a playful personality. You can use it for personal and commercial projects. Download it here Designer: Joan Ramon Pastor Format: Open type, Mac/Windows
